## Download installer {.t1}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="30%"}

- Navigate to **your** server `r fontawesome::fa(name = "chrome")`
- Tap on `DOWNLOAD INTERVIEWER APP` button
- Select desired version
    - Default: without map support
    - Untick `Exclude ESRI Map support`
- Tap on `DOWNLOAD LATEST INTERVIEWER APP` button to download `r fontawesome::fa(name = "file-arrow-down")`

# Login {background-color=var(--s2)}

## Provide URL and user name via QR {.t2}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}
![](assets/scan_qr_code.mp4){fig-align="center"}
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}

### On `r fontawesome::fa(name = "laptop")`

- Log into server as Headquarters
- Open `Teams and Roles > Interviewers`
- Select an interviewer account

### On `r fontawesome::fa(name = "tablet-screen-button")`

- Open Interviewer
- Tap on the QR icon `r fontawesome::fa(name = "qrcode")`
- Read the `r fontawesome::fa(name = "qrcode")` on the `r fontawesome::fa(name = "laptop")` screen

:::

::::

::: aside
See more [here](https://docs.mysurvey.solutions/interviewer/config/set-up-an-interviewer-tablet-by-scanning-a-barcode/)
:::
